version_description:
- iOS 7 compatibility update.
- Performance and stability improvements.

- Fix crash in some model devices.
- Tweak UI.

If you like BoothCool, please rate it at App Store.

- Fix always show app upgrade form after app open

If you like BoothCool, please rate it at App Store.

- Optimize user experience to avoid annoying of ad banner.
- Fix crash after upgrade from v3.1.

If you like BoothCool, please rate it at App Store.

- Fix ad banner overlap with video view.

If you like BoothCool, please rate it at App Store.

- Stability improved

If you like BoothCool, please rate it at App Store.

- Fix UI misplaced after remove ad.

If you like BoothCool, please rate it at App Store.

- Show settings dialog if there is no Camera or Photos access permission.
- Stability improved.

* Fix crash in Dizzy effect after no face detected.
* Swipe down to dismiss share view.
* Optimize face animation effects.
